Wednesday, June 13, 2007























Microsoft's art collection grows up
Hanging in the halls of Microsoft's sprawling corporate campus are 4,500 pieces of contemporary art. Full-time curator Laura Matzer is working to gain respect for the collection in the art world.
FULL STORY

Cable box relief
It has been 11 years since Congress voted to break the cable television industry's stranglehold on set-top boxes.

Video game uproar
Sony has been branded irresponsible for using the Manchester Cathedral in a violent video game.

Safari for PC users
Apple Inc. launched a version of its Safari Web browser for Windows-based PCs on Monday.
FULL STORY






Yahoo blasts China
China should not punish people for expressing their political views on the Internet, Yahoo Inc. said.
